data.eml:eml: Neotropical Hemerodromia Meigen (Diptera: Empididae), a world of discovery I: new generic record and new species from Brazilian Amazon Basin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Câmara, J. T., Plant, A. R., Rafael, J. A. (2014): Neotropical Hemerodromia Meigen (Diptera: Empididae), a world of discovery I: new generic record and new species from Brazilian Amazon Basin. Zootaxa 3893 (2): 209-231, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3893.2.3
